hero.badge: ðŸ§­ Tunisia's Smart Medina Guide App
hero.subtitle: FielMedina combines offline GPS walking tours, audio storytelling, and curated local itineraries so you can explore Tunisia's UNESCO Medina of Sousse like a local.
highlights: Offline GPS walking tours built for the Medina of Sousse
Audio storytelling and cultural insights in English and French
Smart itineraries, saved favorites, and travel alerts on the go

features.title: Everything you need for an unforgettable Medina visit
features.subtitle: Our travel technology blends authentic storytelling with intuitive navigation so every traveler can confidently discover Tunisia's heritage cities.

smartNavigation.title: Offline-first GPS navigation
smartNavigation.description: Follow step-by-step walking tours curated with local historians and optimized for the Medina of Sousse.

localInsights.title: Insider cultural insights
localInsights.description: Hear stories recorded by local experts, discover artisans, and unlock exclusive food, craft, and event recommendations.

culturalGuide.title: Immersive cultural guide
culturalGuide.description: Experience audio narratives, AR-ready content, and thematic trails that bring Tunisia's medinas to life.

ahmed.name: Ahmed Ben Salem
ahmed.text: Fielmedina transformed my visit to Sousse. The navigation was spot-on and I discovered places I never would have found otherwise.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.text: As a professional guide, I recommend this app to all my clients. It's incredibly accurate and user-friendly.

mohamed.name: Mohamed Triki
mohamed.text: Even as a local, I learned new things about my own city. The cultural insights are fascinating.

testimonials.title: Loved by travelers across Tunisia
testimonials.basedOn: Trusted by travelers, local guides, and cultural partners in Tunisia.

ahmed.name: Ahmed Ben Salem
ahmed.text: FielMedina turned my Medina tours into immersive stories. Offline GPS kept me on track and the narratives impressed my audience.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.text: I recommend FielMedina to every traveler I work withâ€”it combines professional guidance with rich cultural context in a single app.

mohamed.name: Mohamed Triki
mohamed.text: Even as a Sousse resident I keep learning new heritage facts. The app is perfect for welcoming friends and family to the Medina.

cta.title: Bring Tunisia's Medinas to your pocket
cta.subtitle: Download the FielMedina travel companion for immersive storytelling, offline navigation, and curated itineraries across Tunisia's heritage cities.

faq.title: FielMedina travel app FAQ
faq.subtitle: Get answers about planning your Tunisia trip with our Medina of Sousse digital guide.

items.question: Is FielMedina free to download?
items.answer: Yes. The app is free on Google Play and the App Store. Optional premium story packs will arrive later in 2025.

items.question: Can I use FielMedina offline while walking in the Medina?
items.answer: Absolutely. Download your route before you arrive and GPS navigation, audio stories, and map pins continue working offline.

items.question: Does the app include audio and storytelling?
items.answer: Every point of interest includes multi-language storytelling, photos, and practical travel tips curated with local experts.

items.question: What new destinations are coming next?
items.answer: We are expanding across Tunisia and preparing launches in Morocco, Algeria, Saudi Arabia, the UAE, Turkey, and Egypt over the next three years.

hero.title: About FielMedina
hero.subtitle: Built by Tunisian storytellers, technologists, and historians, FielMedina protects cultural heritage while guiding modern travelers through the Medina of Sousse.

mission.title: Our vision for cultural tourism
mission.paragraph1: FielMedina helps travelers explore responsibly while supporting the artisans, guides, and guardians of Tunisia's medinas.
mission.paragraph2: We map oral histories, craft immersive routes, and deliver them through accessible technology so every visitor can forge a meaningful connection.
mission.description1: FielMedina helps travelers explore responsibly while supporting the artisans, guides, and guardians of Tunisia's medinas.
mission.description2: We map oral histories, craft immersive routes, and deliver them through accessible technology so every visitor can forge a meaningful connection.

values.title: What guides our work
values.subtitle: These principles keep us scaling responsibly while celebrating Tunisia's living heritage.

heritage.title: Protecting heritage first
heritage.description: We collaborate with conservationists to ensure every digital route respects the Medina's legacy.

innovation.title: Purposeful innovation
innovation.description: We design technology that enhances on-the-ground exploration rather than distracting from it.

community.title: Community partnerships
community.description: Revenue-sharing and co-creation models keep local voices at the heart of FielMedina.

excellence.title: Excellence in experience
excellence.description: Every interface, route, and story is quality-checked with travelers and cultural experts.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate individuals dedicated to bringing Sousse's heritage to life

muhammad.name: Muhammad Aslan
muhammad.description: Passionate about technology and cultural preservation with 10+ years in mobile app development.

sarah.name: Sarah Ben Ali
sarah.description: Local historian and storyteller specializing in Sousse's rich heritage and traditions.

ahmed.name: Ahmed Karray
ahmed.description: Expert in mobile technologies and GPS systems, bringing technical excellence to every feature.

founder.name: Muhammad Aslan
founder.description: Passionate about technology and cultural preservation with 10+ years in mobile app development.

cultural.name: Sarah Ben Ali
cultural.description: Local historian and storyteller specializing in Sousse's rich heritage and traditions.

developer.name: Ahmed Karray
developer.description: Expert in mobile technologies and GPS systems, bringing technical excellence to every feature.

timeline.title: Milestones in our journey
timeline.subtitle: From a local idea to a regional travel platform for the Arab world and North Africa.

vision.title: Vision conceived in Sousse
vision.description: We began documenting the Medina through audio interviews with artisans, historians, and local guides.

development.title: Platform design and beta testing
development.description: Our team prototyped offline navigation, AR storytelling, and multilingual support with early travelers.

beta.title: Launch across the Medina of Sousse
beta.description: FielMedina debuted on Android and iOS with curated routes, heritage stories, and local business spotlights.

launch.title: Regional expansion roadmap
launch.description: We are mapping medinas in Tunisia, Morocco, Algeria, Saudi Arabia, the UAE, Turkey, and Egypt with local partners.

2023.title: The Vision
2023.description: Conceived the idea to digitally preserve and share Sousse's medina heritage

2024a.title: Development Begins
2024a.description: Started working with local historians and community members to map the medina

2024b.title: Beta Launch
2024b.description: Released the first version to local testers and cultural enthusiasts

2025.title: Global Launch
2025.description: Officially launched FielMedina Sousse on Google Play Store

whyFielmedina.title: Why Choose FielMedina?
whyFielmedina.feature1: Authentic storytelling recorded with local historians
whyFielmedina.feature2: GPS itineraries tailored to heritage preservation routes
whyFielmedina.feature3: Inclusive design across languages and accessibility needs
whyFielmedina.feature4: Roadmap expanding to medinas across North Africa and the Middle East

cta.title: Join us in elevating heritage travel
cta.subtitle: Become part of the movement bringing Tunisia's medinas to curious travelers worldwide.

hero.title: Contact the FielMedina team

form.description: Share your partnership idea, press enquiry, or traveler question and we will respond quickly.

location.title: Our Location
location.description: Located in the heart of Sousse's historic medina, surrounded by centuries of cultural heritage and tradition.

socialSection.title: Connect with our community
socialSection.subtitle: Follow FielMedina for new story drops, destination launches, and cultural travel tips.

social.title: Follow Our Journey
social.subtitle: Stay connected with us on social media for the latest updates, behind-the-scenes content, and cultural insights from Sousse.

faq.title: Support and partnership FAQ
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about working with the FielMedina platform.

free.question: Is there a cost to partner with FielMedina?
free.answer: Partner listings are currently free while we grow the marketplace. Co-branded campaigns are tailor-made per project.

offline.question: Do you support international press and media interviews?
offline.answer: Yes. Our founders and cultural experts are available for interviews about Tunisian heritage, smart tourism, and the future of digital guides.

gps.question: How can local businesses appear inside the app?
gps.answer: Submit your profile with location, story, and images via the form above and our curation team will contact you.

contribute.question: How soon will FielMedina launch in other countries?
contribute.answer: We are onboarding partners across Tunisia and opening beta programs for Morocco, Algeria, Saudi Arabia, the UAE, Turkey, and Egypt.

faq.a1: Yes! FielMedina is completely free to download and use. We believe cultural heritage should be accessible to everyone.
faq.a2: Absolutely! Once you download the content, you can explore the medina and access stories even without an internet connection.
faq.q3: How accurate is the GPS navigation?
faq.a3: Our GPS system is highly accurate within the medina. We've carefully mapped every location to ensure precise navigation through the historic streets.
faq.q4: Can I contribute my own stories or photos?
faq.a4: We love community contributions! Please contact us through this form to discuss how you can share your knowledge and experiences.

cta.title: Letâ€™s create unforgettable Medina journeys together
cta.subtitle: Collaborate with FielMedina to inspire travelers, promote local artisans, and scale smart tourism across the region.

termsConditions.title: Terms & Conditions
termsConditions.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using FielMedina. By using our app, you agree to these terms and conditions.

keyPoints.title: Key Terms Overview
keyPoints.subtitle: Essential points about using FielMedina responsibly

freeService.title: Free Service
freeService.description: FielMedina is provided as a free service for exploring medinas.

userResponsibility.title: User Responsibility
userResponsibility.description: Users are responsible for their safety and following local laws and regulations.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: The app is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: The app is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.description: Use the app responsibly and in accordance with applicable laws.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By downloading, installing, or using the FielMedina mobile application ("the App"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the App.
acceptance.content2: These Terms constitute a legal agreement between you and Fielmedina ("we," "us," or "our"), the developer and operator of FielMedina.

appDescription.title: 2. App Description & Service
appDescription.content1: FielMedina is a free mobile navigation and cultural guide application designed to help users explore the historic medina of Sousse, Tunisia. The App provides:
appDescription.feature1: GPS navigation and mapping services within the medina
appDescription.feature2: Cultural and historical information about locations
appDescription.feature3: Local recommendations and points of interest
appDescription.content2: The service is provided "AS IS" and may be updated, modified, or discontinued at our discretion.

description.title: 2. App Description & Service
description.content1: FielMedina is a free mobile navigation and cultural guide application designed to help users explore the historic medina of Sousse, Tunisia. The App provides:
description.feature1: GPS navigation and mapping services within the medina
description.feature2: Cultural and historical information about locations
description.feature3: Local recommendations and points of interest
description.content2: The service is provided "AS IS" and may be updated, modified, or discontinued at our discretion.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities & Acceptable Use
userResponsibilities.content1: By using FielMedina, you agree to:
userResponsibilities.responsibility1: Use the App only for lawful purposes and in accordance with local laws
userResponsibilities.responsibility2: Respect local customs, traditions, and private property
userResponsibilities.responsibility3: Exercise personal responsibility for your safety while navigating
userResponsibilities.responsibility4: Not use the App for any commercial purposes without permission
userResponsibilities.responsibility5: Not attempt to reverse engineer, hack, or interfere with the App
userResponsibilities.responsibility6: Provide accurate information when contacting our support team

safetyNotice.title: Safety Notice:
safetyNotice.content: Always prioritize your personal safety. Be aware of your surroundings, follow local safety guidelines, and use common sense when exploring unfamiliar areas.

privacy.title: 4. Privacy & Data Collection
privacy.content1: Your privacy is important to us. By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of information as described in our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.
privacy.content2: The App requires location services to provide navigation functionality. You can control location permissions through your device settings.
privacy.linkText: Read our full Privacy Policy â†’

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content1: All content within the FielMedina app, including but not limited to text, graphics, images, logos, audio clips, digital downloads, and software, is the property of Fielmedina or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.content2: You may not modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell any content obtained from the App without explicit permission.
intellectualProperty.content3: The FielMedina name and logo are trademarks of Fielmedina and may not be used without permission.

disclaimers.title: 6. Disclaimers & Limitation of Liability
disclaimers.disclaimersContent: The App is provided "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to:
disclaimers.disclaimer1: Accuracy, reliability, or completeness of navigation or location data
disclaimers.liabilityContent: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Fielmedina shall not be liable for:
disclaimers.liability1: Any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages
disclaimers.liability2: Personal injury or property damage resulting from app use
disclaimers.liability4: Loss of data or business interruption
disclaimers.liability5: Any damages exceeding the amount paid for the App (which is free)

thirdParty.title: 7. Third-Party Services & Content
thirdParty.content1: The App may integrate with or contain links to third-party services, websites, or content. These third-party services have their own terms and privacy policies, and we are not responsible for their content or practices.
thirdParty.content2: Third-party services used by FielMedina include:

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content1: You may stop using the App at any time by uninstalling it from your device. We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to the App at our discretion, without notice, for any reason including breach of these Terms.
termination.content2: Upon termination, your right to use the App will cease immediately, but the provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive will remain in effect.

governingLaw.title: 9. Governing Law & Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.content1: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Tunisia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
governingLaw.content2: Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of the App shall be resolved through good faith negotiations. If a resolution cannot be reached, disputes may be submitted to the appropriate courts in Sousse, Tunisia.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. When we make changes, we will update the "Last updated" date at the top of this page and notify users through the App or other appropriate means.
changes.content2: Your continued use of the App after any changes indicates your acceptance of the modified Terms. If you do not agree to the changes, you should stop using the App.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content1: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:
contact.contactMessage: If you have any questions about this Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

cta.title: Ready to Explore Sousse?
cta.subtitle: Download Fielmedina now and start your unforgettable journey through the historic medina of Sousse.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use FielMedina.

keyPoints.title: Our Privacy Commitments
keyPoints.subtitle: Here's what you need to know about how we handle your data

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We're transparent about what data we collect and how we use it.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Your privacy is our priority - we only collect what's necessary for the app to function.

noSale.title: No Sale of Data
noSale.description: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: This Privacy Policy applies to the FielMedina mobile application (the "Application") developed by Fielmedina (the "Service Provider") as a free service. This service is provided "AS IS" and is designed to help users navigate and explore the historic medina of Sousse, Tunisia.
introduction.content2: By using our Application, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our app.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.userProvidedContent: The Application may collect information you provide when you:
informationCollection.userProvided2: Contact us through the app or our support channels
informationCollection.userProvided4: Participate in surveys or promotional activities
userProvidedList: Contact us through the app or our support channels
Participate in surveys or promotional activities
informationCollection.automaticContent: The Application may automatically collect certain information, including:
informationCollection.automatic1: Device type and mobile operating system
informationCollection.automatic5: App usage patterns and navigation data
automaticList: Device type and mobile operating system
App usage patterns and navigation data

locationInformation.title: Location Information
locationInformation.content1: FielMedina is a navigation app that requires location services to function properly. Here's how we handle your location data:
locationInformation.gpsNavigation: GPS Navigation: We use your location to provide turn-by-turn navigation through the medina
locationInformation.nearbyPOI: Nearby Points of Interest: Location data helps us show relevant attractions and shops near you
locationInformation.improvedExperience: Improved Experience: We analyze aggregated, anonymized location patterns to improve our maps and recommendations
locationInformation.offlineFunctionality: Offline Functionality: Location data is processed locally on your device when using offline features
locationInformation.important: Important: You can disable location services at any time through your device settings, but this may limit the app's navigation functionality.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content1: The Application uses the following third-party services that may collect information:
thirdPartyServices.googlePlayDesc: For app distribution, updates, and core Android functionality
thirdPartyServices.firebaseDesc: For app performance monitoring and user analytics
thirdPartyServices.content2: These services have their own privacy policies that govern their data collection practices. We only share anonymized, aggregated data with these services.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security & Retention
dataSecurity.content1: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information:
dataSecurity.measure1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
dataSecurity.measure3: Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
dataSecurity.measure4: Secure data centers with physical and digital protection
dataSecurity.retention1: User data is retained only as long as necessary for app functionality
dataSecurity.retention2: Analytics data is retained for up to 24 months
dataSecurity.retention3: You can request deletion of your data by contacting us at info@fielmedina.com
measures: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
Secure data centers with physical and digital protection
retentionPolicies: User data is retained only as long as necessary for app functionality
Analytics data is retained for up to 24 months
You can request deletion of your data by contacting us at info@fielmedina.com

userRights.title: Your Rights & Choices
userRights.content1: You have several rights regarding your personal information:
userRights.access: Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
userRights.correction: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
userRights.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
userRights.optOut: Opt-out: Uninstall the app to stop all data collection
userRights.locationServices: Location Services: Disable location access through device settings
userRights.exerciseRights: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at info@fielmedina.com. We will respond within a reasonable timeframe.

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content1: FielMedina does not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13 years of age. If we discover that a child under 13 has provided personal information, we will immediately delete this information from our servers.
childrensPrivacy.content2: If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided personal information, please contact us at info@fielmedina.com so we can take appropriate action.

updates.title: Updates & Contact
updates.content1: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for legal and regulatory reasons. We will notify users of significant changes through the app or by updating this page.
updates.contactContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
